text: 5.7: Kis 12.5; 12.21; 13.7; Ais 53.7; Zo 1.29; 1 Pi 1.19; VB 5.6; 5.12Maaŋ muuŋgip, nde za mba isa vur, nde zam ana ndi mbur suegɨp, nde is ki fhuv viktuma kama farar muuŋgip wari kɨri. Gu nde kaŋgi. Nde is ki fhuv viktuma fara muuŋgiap wari ki. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, mbe Krais shogiap, anan nde nzuav ofa muuŋgi. Ana Pasova, tuga bakɨmen shogiap, ofa mbui sipsiva fara muuŋgi.
